title: Corda Flow Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the flow section.

maxRetryAttempts.description: The maximum number of times Corda retries a transient error before failing the flow. A value of zero disables retries.

maxRetryDelay.description: The maximum delay in milliseconds before Corda schedules a retry.

maxFlowSleepDuration.description: The maximum delay in milliseconds before Corda schedules a periodic wake-up.

cleanupTime.description: The length of time in milliseconds that the flow mapper holds onto its state for a flow that has finished. This value should be at least 2 times larger than the session.p2pTTL.

messageResendWindow.description: The length of time in milliseconds that Corda waits before resending unacknowledged flow session messages.

heartbeatTimeout.description: The length of time in milliseconds that Corda waits when no message has been received from a counterparty before causing the session to error. This should be set at least 2 times larger than session.messageResendWindow.

missingCounterpartyTimeout.description: The length of time in milliseconds to wait when the counterparty can't be found in a member lookup before causing the session to error

p2pTTL.description: The TTL set in milliseconds. This is added to the current time and set on messages passed to the P2P layer to send to a counterparty. Messages received with a TTL timestamp set in the past will be discarded.

cleanupTime.description: The length of time in milliseconds that the flow mapper holds onto its state for a session after the session has finished. This value should be at least 2 times larger than the session.p2pTTL

event.description: Settings for external events within a flow.

messageResendWindow.description: The length of time in milliseconds that Corda waits before resending unprocessed external events.

maxRetries.description: The maximum number of times Corda retries a request before returning an exception.
